channel.title: Art on darkvolumes

item.title: Design Chairs
item.description:
Design Chairs A selection of design chairs, by chronological order. 1925 Gerrit Rietveld - Red and Blue Chair
1925 Marcel Breuer - Wassily Chair
1928 Le Corbusier - Chaise Longue
1948 Charles and Ray Eames - La Chaise
1956 Nelson - Marshmallow Sofa 1957 Arne Jacobsen - Drop Egg and Swan 1963-65 Eero Aarnio - Globe Chair 1972 Frank Gehry - Wiggle Side Chair
